Package model

Interface Character

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IOCharacter
    public interface Character
    An interface that represents a player Character in an Infinite Odyssey's campaign.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getHP()
      Returns the current health points this Character has.
      int getMaxHP()
      Returns the maximum health point value this Character can have.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of this Character.
      java.lang.String getPlayerName()
      Returns the name of the player who is playing this Character.
      java.lang.String getRole()
      Returns the role of this Character.
      int getRoleValueOf​(java.lang.String stat)
      Returns the value of the given stat that this Character has.
      java.lang.String getSpecification()
      Returns this Role's specification.
      int getValueOf​(java.lang.String stat)
      Returns the value of the given stat that this Character has.
      void setHP​(int hp)
      Sets the value of this Character's hp to the given integer.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns this Character's name and player name.
      java.lang.String toStringAll()
      Returns this Character's name, player name, class, class specification, and all of its stats, along with their values.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of this Character.
        Returns:
        the name of this Character.

      • getPlayerName

        java.lang.String getPlayerName()
        Returns the name of the player who is playing this Character.
        Returns:

      • getValueOf

        int getValueOf​(java.lang.String stat)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the value of the given stat that this Character has. The String's case should be irrelevant.
        Parameters:
        stat - returns the value of the given stat.
        Returns:
        the value of the given stat
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given stat does not exist for this character

      • getRole

        java.lang.String getRole()
        Returns the role of this Character.
        Returns:
        the role of this Character.

            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the value of the given stat that this Character has.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the value of the given stat

      • getSpecification

        java.lang.String getSpecification()
        Returns this Role's specification.
        Returns:

      • getHP

        int getHP()
        Returns the current health points this Character has.
        Returns:
        the current health points this Character has.

      • setHP

        void setHP​(int hp)
        Sets the value of this Character's hp to the given integer. If the integer is less than 0, the hp will be set to 0. If the integer is greater than the Character's max hp.
        Parameters:
        hp - the new hp value

      • getMaxHP

        int getMaxHP()
        Returns the maximum health point value this Character can have.
        Returns:
        the maximum health point value this Character can have.

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Returns this Character's name and player name. The player name should be in parentheses.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        this character's name and playerName.

      • toStringAll

        java.lang.String toStringAll()
        Returns this Character's name, player name, class, class specification, and all of its stats, along with their values.
        Returns:
        this character's information.
